author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA EXPECTED TO CROSS THE INTERNATIONAL DATELINE IN THE NEXT 6 HOURS OR SO...
summary: ...IONA EXPECTED TO CROSS THE INTERNATIONAL DATELINE IN THE NEXT 6 HOURS OR SO... As of 5:00 PM HST Fri Aug 01 the center of Iona was located near 15.8, -179.5 with movement WNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA EXPECTED TO CROSS THE INTERNATIONAL DATELINE IN THE NEXT 6 HOURS OR SO... As of 5:00 PM HST Fri Aug 01 the center of Iona was located near 15.8, -179.5 with movement WNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Iona (CP1/CP012025)
